TrainingDetails.Title: Image Gallery
TrainingDetails.Abstract: This page is for displaying large groups of images in a convenient format.
TrainingDetails.BodyCopy:
Under Construction

For this page you will need to know:

  • How to upload an image [link to image element page]
  • How to create an image component and place it under the gallery page (As a child page) [link to image component page]

Other Notes:

Images go under the gallery page.

All images that are under the gallery page will appear in the gallery.

Images that are under the gallery need to have the "make thumbnail" box checked, this will create a small thumbnail at the top of the page.

This gallery is very customizable:

Auto-rotation- When the page loads, do you want it to start the gallery automatically or not

Thumbnails per page- How many thumbnails do you want displayed at the top of the page

Seconds per image- How many seconds per image do you want the player to pause on any given thumbnail.
